WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
 
I am currently parsing an html table and building an excel document from it. Everything works fine except for the height attribute. I iterate trough the first 50 rows setting the height of the cell to the values collected and I end up with 65536 rows and a huge scrollbar (scrolls thousands of records at a time).
 
Any idea how I could fix this?
 
Thanks in advance,
Desartus
WorkItem.Summary: Setting row height brings scroll bar to max size (65536 rows)
